org.deeplearning4j.nn.api

Interface Model

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Classifier, NeuralNetwork
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AutoEncoder, BaseMultiLayerNetwork, BaseNeuralNetwork, DBN, DenoisingAutoEncoder, OutputLayer, RBM, SemanticHashing, StackedAutoEncoder, StackedDenoisingAutoEncoder

    public interface Model
    A Model is meant for predicting something from data. Note that this is not like supervised learning where there are labels attached to the examples.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • score

        double score()

      • transform

        org.nd4j.linalg.api.ndarray.INDArray transform(org.nd4j.linalg.api.ndarray.INDArray data)
        Transform the data based on the model's output. This can be anything from a number to reconstructions.
        Parameters:
        data - the data to transform
        Returns:
        the transformed data

      • params

        org.nd4j.linalg.api.ndarray.INDArray params()
        Parameters of the model (if any)
        Returns:
        the parameters of the model

      • numParams

        int numParams()
        The number of parameters for the model
        Returns:
        the number of parameters for the model

      • setParams

        void setParams(org.nd4j.linalg.api.ndarray.INDArray params)
        Set the parameters for this model. This expects a linear ndarray which then be unpacked internally relative to the expected ordering of the model
        Parameters:
        params - the parameters for the model

      • fit

        void fit(org.nd4j.linalg.api.ndarray.INDArray data,
         java.lang.Object[] params)
        Fit the model to the given data
        Parameters:
        data - the data to fit the model to
        params - the params (mixed values)

      • fit

        void fit(org.nd4j.linalg.api.ndarray.INDArray data)
        Fit the model to the given data
        Parameters:
        data - the data to fit the model to

      • iterate

        void iterate(org.nd4j.linalg.api.ndarray.INDArray input,
             java.lang.Object[] params)
        Run one iteration
        Parameters:
        input - the input to iterate on
        params - the extra params for the neural network(k, corruption level, max epochs,...)
